Texas Fiberglass Pools is absolutely amazing they did a beautiful job on my pool the deck and a whole lot more. They truly go above and beyond. Their customer service is absolutely outstanding. I would highly recommend them for all your pool needs.

After we found out our pool had pool cancer we were referred to Oliver and Texas Fiberglass Pools. They have been nothing short of exceptional. We had the pool repaired, resurfaced, coping stones redone, tile grouted and the crew has been … More
